scripts.say: Huh? I found a weird box!
What's this? It looks like it fell out of the sky...
Who dropped these supplies for us...?
It doesn't look like this is booby trapped...
Do you think someone is trying to help us out? Let's open it up and see what's inside~â™ª
That may be the case, but let's open it carefully since there's no telling what's inside.
Pay attention to your surroundings! We're not the only ones who saw this box drop so there must be enemies nearby!
AI? Suddenly, you seem like you're a pro at this?!
While you guys were chatting, Inazuma and Ikazuchi already started rummaging through the box...
See, someone definitely dropped these supplies to help us out. Whoever you are, we accept your gift graciously!
I see, I see! Looks like the more we collect, the stronger we'll be! Let's keep our eyes peeled and grab as much loot as we can!
